text: 7:38: Ezek 47:1; Zak 14:8Pathien lekhabu'n ati anghan, tukhom mi iem kai chu a sûng renga ‘Ringna-pêk’ tuinârngei luong suok atih,”7:38: Archang 37-38 taka Jisua chongbâingei hi ma anghin melet thei ani: “Tukhom a tui inrâl ngei chu ko kôm hong senla ngeia male nêk rese ngei. 38 Pathien lekhabu'n ati anghan, tukhom, mi iem kai chu an sûng renga ‘Ringna-pêk tuinârngei luong suok atih.’” a tipe ngeia.
